website_summaries.verdict: Keeping motorists protected from unwanted speeding tickets for decades, this warrantied radar and laser detector alerts potential hazards that put a crimp in travel time.
pros: Comes with a power cord and 2 types of mount: suction cup and slip-free mat (which can also be used for cell phones)
Beeps for just a short while, then flashes silently
Fewer false alerts than other comparable, lower-cost models
cons: Limited to signal detection within the United States and Canada
LED alert hard to see in sunlight, so volume needs to be turned up

website_summaries.verdict: Great price for a full-featured detector, although it does offer up a fair amount of false alerts.
pros: Easy to use, just set it and forget it
Has a good range, and picks up signals over bridges, around corners, etc
cons: Unit gets very hot, particularly in the summer
Suffers from a fair amount of false alerts
Cord is not coiled, leaving excess length in the way

customer_reviews.title: Already paid for itself 😁. I wanted to share ...
customer_reviews.text: Already paid for itself 😁. I wanted to share with others that it beeps when there are no police cars around. If you hold down the city button until it beeps then the lights change colors. There is a green one that shows when there is a radio frequency on a stop light or another emergency vehicle. When a middle red bar that lights all the way to the top bar and lights up the KA in red in the middle of it, this is an actual police car.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: it works great. Cautionary note though
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it works great. Cautionary note though...the cops can sense when you have a radar detector. I flew over a hill where a cop clocked my speeding. When he pulled me over, he knew exactly when my detector alarm went off (and I hit the brakes)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great!! did save me for a couple times lol where have you been all my whole life?!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great insurance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great insurance for the price. Has possibly saved me 2 tickets in a week. I do a lot of driving for my job and I can say it works as well, if not better than some of the more expensive detectors that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just got it the other day and it definitely picks up the signals from cops and cvs. but I haven't driven by any cops posted up yet. I will give feedback when this happens UPDATE: it picks up the different signals well (radar & laser). Especially the radar, it saved my ass a bunch of times. although it picked up the laser, it was too late... $160 going 80 in a 55... but at least it works 😂 not a lot of false alarms and it gets the waves front and behind me well. Good for the price, great for radar detection, not so much laser 😭
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had this with all the warnings to come on at level 10. It did not work. $440 speeding ticket later. It does not pick up highway patrol or any laser.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I use my radar detector when i have to travel through New Mexico, Oklahoma, Kansas and Missouri. It works great in all these states that I traveled. It picks up even little hick sheriffs units in the middle of no where. I am buying a second one. It works great with pop up laser. It has save me thousands of dollars in speeding tickets. I had not gotten one. Today's date is March 2019 and it still works picking up radar. I just have one word "BUY IT". You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gun

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this damn thing! I hate the idea of speeding on a regular basis. My girlfriend lives about 2 hours away and I drive to her place most Friday nights after work. I leave late and I'm always trying to get there as quick as possible. Most traffic (when actually flowing) is moving at 80mph anyway, it's just nice knowing when someone using radar in the area when you're trying to make up time
customer_reviews.author: blkeyewrx

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need this, you don’t want this. It does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: It never stops going off. I’m not sure how this was rated so well when I purchased it. It is absolutely useless. I’ve never been so close to just throwing something out my window as I have this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Crutchleo

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Constantly going off in my retired police car, no just kidding, works great, X/K always goes off in like parking lots near automatic sliding glass doors and Ka is almost always a real officer. Every now and again it won’t pick up a radar until I’ve already passed the cop running it (facing towards or against me) however sometimes it will go off what seems like a mile in advance and has helped a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Galardi

customer_reviews.title: Worked good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year and a half or so, and it worked great! Rarely false alarmed on city streets, and would detect radar pretty far out under the right conditions. Then one day I tried to turn it on and..nothing. Tried my other outlet, same thing. Plugged in my phone charger to check if the fuse blew or the plug went bad, but it worked just fine. Seeing as I’m living in Arizona, I’m assuming something inside got too hot and melted or burnt up. I kept it stored in my glove box to keep it out of direct sunlight when not in use though, so I’m not sure exactly what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Collin P.

customer_reviews.title: One badass radar/laser detector!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I used it daily in my '17 Dodge Challenger SCAT PACK. I have had the detector in my car now for almost 3 weeks. It sounds off when I don't see police. Thus far I have not picked up any laser warning however, I have picked up radar on a daily basis. The detector does a great job and for the money it is an absolute essential to have in plan of going over the speed limit in any area. BUY IT CAUSE YOU WON'T REGRET IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: SPARTANWARRIOR

customer_reviews.title: Works great! you may want to turn off the k ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! you may want to turn off the x band if it's not used in your state... I never hear it unless it's a cop or a camera. I find the cops everywhere in the city or highway. I drive a Lexis and it's quick, I need this to slow me down at the right time. I've beat lasers and radar both... Saved me from all sorts of tickets.
customer_reviews.author: NormalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Teaches my son to slow down.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a good price, a lot cheaper than a speeding ticket and it teaches my son to slow down because the device goes off sometimes around banks and restaurants (must be the alarm systems??).
customer_reviews.author: Coach Mack, PCC

customer_reviews.title: No Range!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Cobra ESD 7570 to upgrade from my previous one that worked great. The few times it actually picked up a radar it would have been too late to slow down. I realize they must have their radar on for the detector to pick it up, but with that being said my old cobra ALWAYS picked up the usual speed traps. I do not get all the positive reviews. I did use this product for awhile before writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Decent equipment
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it does a loud beep at the beginning then quite down to get your attention. When the detector goes off, it will make a distinctive beep for each one. At first, I was agitated at the false alarm. I turned off x and k band and left on Ka, L, V/S. Now it works perfectly. When you see a cop and it doesn't goes off, there's a good chance he don't even have the speed gun caliber on to transmit the frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Bui

customer_reviews.title: Cigarette power cord is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Cigarette adapter is finicky, had to move it around to get a good connection. Detector seems ok. It amazes me how companies will go to great lengths in adding the cheapest power supply cord they can find. The cord is the most important item, is it not??? OMG
customer_reviews.author: cominatyalive

customer_reviews.title: Best radar detector for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Over the last several years I have gone through some of these low-cost radar detectors and been very disappointed and in some cases even receiving tickets without the detector going off. I will say that this is the best radar detector I have ever owned and I am thoroughly impressed with it. So much so that I plan to get one for my wife as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Alfeld

customer_reviews.title: More convenient then you'd think!
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and on time. It works great and even warned me prior of cops ahead. And once or twice behind. Volume control was useful and so was city/highway mode change. Automatically quiets warnings after 3 beeps (gets really soft but continues for the duration of any detections). This product was really well thought out and tried to be as least annoying as possible while making sure you get notified of any radars. Also it does pick up emergency vehicles like ambulances which is really helpful
customer_reviews.author: chris griffith

customer_reviews.title: Radar Detector
customer_reviews.text: Honestly - this seems to give nothing but false alarms. I have been using it for one week now and I have yet to see a law enforcement vehicle in the area when this alarms. It seems to do minimal detection beeps with something as simple as a house with a security system, (and the radar detector was in "city" mode). I'm not impressed at all. You may want to go a bit more expensive/advanced and prevent the false alarms.
customer_reviews.author: schmirretti

customer_reviews.title: better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: This is my first radar detector, so i wasn't sure quite what to expect. But i didn't expect much at the price compared to other detectors that were $300+. Actually does a pretty good job of finding radar signals maybe 75% of the time. The other 25% of the time, I've driven right by cops who i know had their radars on, and it didn't even chirp. For the money, I'd say it's worth it, but also a good idea to keep your eyes peeled in case it doesn't decide to work
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after about a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about 4 years ago and only got to use it for about 9 months. After a while, every time I turned it on, it would constantly alert me and the suction became much less powerful (would fall off window). Before that, it worked fine. It would always alert me about a half mile away from any cops and about a quarter mile from security systems (banks, jewelry stores, etc.) . I wish it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonAbernathy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I drive from NYC to Toronto every week (500mls/800km) and going through some of the highways there are a ton of cops in NY. I have been using it now for close to 3 weeks and it has worked every time. A number of times there has been a cop around a curb or on the on ramp, the radar detector picks them up all the time. Great investment for the price it has paid off ten fold. I unplug it in the city as there is no real need for it and every time I'm around a Jeep it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Big results from a low price detector.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this economical radar detector. The range exceeds my expectations. In a recent 3000 mile trip, it alerted me to every trap. I even got lasered twice. The only thing that I wasn’t expecting was that Honda and Chrysler blind spot radars triggered the Ka band. I was able to deal with that. It’s well worth the money, I’m not sure that the extra couple hundred for a big name detector would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Buzalski

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a month and then the display died.
customer_reviews.text: I drove with this for a month before the display stopped working. It still detects radar and emits noise but you cant see any visual indicators. I wasnt expecting something top of the line, but I also thought it would work for more than a month. When it works it works decent with a good amount of range.
customer_reviews.author: I like turtles

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, although it could be a little louder. Just tested it on a road trip. It showed EVERY cop, and... did you know the EZ Pass was checking speed also?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the detection range is not what I expected. You have to be close to the radar to be alarmed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes off all the time
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I just drive in an area with a lot of radar, but this thing goes off constantly. We have seen police cars at times, but most of the time we’ve seen nothing. Unfortunately I missed the date to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I was getting beeps for a radar, little did I know it was detecting nothing. It worked and saved me a couple time I must admit so it did work. Just that the thing at one point started beeping non stop. For no exact reason. There was no radars no cops, I was the only car in the road. I ended up not using it at all it was useless
customer_reviews.author: Harold Cerna

customer_reviews.title: Speed with No Fear
customer_reviews.text: It saved me from getting arrested going 140mph in my M3 BMW!! It lets me break the law and get away with it again and again. I deactivated the speed governor on my BMW and had it up to 187mph. Cool as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Bimmer Freak

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Paid for itself the first 20 miles
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the price. Not disappointed at all, depending on how you mount it, it reads from a 2 mile radius on highway mode and 2 blocks or so on city mode
customer_reviews.author: Trae Stenerson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Over 20 cops car drove passed by me. This device is just doesn’t work for me, in my case. Good luck to y’all. By the way, it’s able to detect traffic lights laser, sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Be advised it gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: Work good,very portable, wedge into headrest ny-loc to the glare strip. Problem is it get HOT when charging or plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this Cobra Radar Detector and I haven’t really had great experience with it. It only goes off when I am near security scanners at stores but never has it gone off when there is a cop around. I have noticed several times a cop is directly behind me and/or passing next to/infront of me and the detector never rang off. The volume also lowers by itself even though its set to full volume. Maybe its just a particular device or what I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Singh

customer_reviews.title: Works for the prices
customer_reviews.text: This product does work good if your on trips. But for everyday use in a small town dont work well. Seems like it only goes off when you go past stores for the doors!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a lot
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how many times this little friend saved me!!! I travel a lot & go nowhere without it. You can tell the difference between a cop & other alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me honest
customer_reviews.text: This product has already saved me at least two tickets. I don't know about all the technology advantages. All I know is it works great! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Tevlin

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself in 2 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from my phone while driving away from a ticket. Review had this as the best buy for the money. 8 months later I have to say it has saved my license from being revoked. Incredibly fast shipping, best $50 I ever spent on 'car stuff'.
customer_reviews.author: Buy Low - Sell High

customer_reviews.title: Good range but some false alarms?
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year and it has often detected radar from a large enough distance that I could react before I was the car being measured. I do get a lot of false positives (I think). Sometimes the alarm will go off for many miles and the car driving near me is not a police car. I am guessing that it might be reacting to someone's radar scrambler.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Holy Guacamole
customer_reviews.text: This Cobra is magnificent. The price is stupid cheap. And it's just as good as my ~$250 Cobra Whistler from 2008. The design is sharp. But, most of all, the response time is remarkable. Compared to my last one..yeah, incredible!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer colson

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device in my car now for about 3 or so months. I must say it definitely does the job. I am very happy with my purchase and think it is totally worth every penny spent. I will be buying another one for my husband's car.
customer_reviews.author: Kalinko

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works really well 2017 focus RS no tickets sence purchase. It's almost impossible to get a ticket with advanced warning and 6 piston breaks, and pilot cup ii tires. All I need is a second to drop 30mph and this gives it.
customer_reviews.author: Pcriged

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye speeding tickets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Ive had this product for over a year with 0 tickets.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.  Read instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Received last week and only had a chance to set up 2 days ago. Set up easy. Have been using it for suburban mostly so far. Notifications are great. Picked up police vehicle 1/2 mi away on the other side of a hill. I was partly up the other side of the hill. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The volume is too low . I have to keep my radio on low just to hear it. Out of all my other cobar’s this is like crap on my volume & it doesn’t pick up all cops. On getting it , quick!! Thank u seller
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: its decent.. doesnt detect radars at a far ...
customer_reviews.text: its decent..doesnt detect radars at a far distance but it alerts when the radar is being pointed at you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it to pay for the speeding ticket
customer_reviews.text: 0/10 was properly set up and got a ticket a few days after purchasing this. It loved to go off when there was no reason to as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Jester

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works how it is supposed to, detects a lot more than you would think for something on the cheaper side. The product speaks for itself. I recommend getting an extended cobra cord for it that will connect to the fuse box so every time your car is on IT will be on.. also so you can use your phone charger port.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Brady

customer_reviews.title: 6 Months. No tickets.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this detector for 6 months now with no tickets. I drive the majority of my time on the highway and it picks up speed traps very well. I am not sure about city usage, but using on the highway has saved me a few tickets!
customer_reviews.author: James Fox

customer_reviews.title: It works!! (:
customer_reviews.text: Very nice radar for the price, like every radar, they arnt all perfect but I drive with all limo tint and front windshield 35 with a 20 strip on top to the as1 line and it still detects the cops, sometimes I'll be driving by and I'll see cops but most likely because they don't have the radar on, but has saved me from so many speed traps (;
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Torres

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and i installed in immediately. It detects as it says it should and works great. I recommend buying if you're looking for a radar detector. It's cheaper than others i've had in the past and works just as well as the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Not many bells and whistles, but works well, long range
customer_reviews.author: Howard Larrabee

customer_reviews.title: cheap and it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: love this got me out of so many tickets.rang is good, sound is really loud and annoying but it get the job done
customer_reviews.author: julian minner

customer_reviews.title: Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar/Laser Detector with 360 Degree Detection
customer_reviews.text: So far this radar detector has worked fairly well and for the price it is a good product. Only thing I don't like is a lot of false alarms but it has alerted me and saved me on getting speeding tickets.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Gonzalez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Saved Dad from Ticket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for a Christmas gift. Still works 8 months later. At first he didn't seem to like it that much but than he started using it more and said it saved him a couple times from a ticket so it pretty much paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Matthew Stroer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The first time using it 2 police vehicles were identified within 1 mile!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself on the first trip! Display is a little dim for day light driving, otherwise, very pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: David's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. Always alerts me as soon as the officer is in view. However the officer also has your speed as soon as you are in view so dont reley completely on this device to get you out of tickets. The radar gun works faster than a detector. As soon as it goes off the officer already has your speed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Reliable service!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and profile but the power supply connections have to be wiggled a little most of the time to get it to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy being able to know my surroundings and that I’ll be ok on my travels.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Best working radar detector I've purchased already buying a second ...
customer_reviews.text: Best working radar detector I've purchased already buying a second for a friend. Side note: it does pick up semis as well as large trucks but they're a different reading.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend and we are very surprised in the performance. It picks up the commonly used radars just as good as my more expensive one. The only downfall is the screen is very dim. Other than that, works great! Grab this is you're interested in a radar but don't want to drop a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to do a 500 mi. trip, and can't complain. People complaining about this radar please read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the $
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare this to but it's works and works pretty good, too. During a recent 4 plus hour trip to Minneapolis this unit alerted me to many troopers running with radars on. I've had some false alarms but I'm really happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Iowa guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to figure out the symbols but after a while I understood and it was really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: d&b

customer_reviews.title: Works most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price. Detects about 80% of cop cars (other 20% may not use their radars). Lacks signs for showing where radar traps are located or sometimes beeps too late. Most importantly look out for "Ka" waves. I always use it in city mode even on highways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well just keep in mind the 18 wheeler trucks can make it go off too.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: ... radar detector but as I found out it works awesome.. helps me a lot on the road ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be some cheap toy radar detector but as I found out it works awesome ..helps me a lot on the road and highways ..I would recommend it to anyone if u want to avoid getting a ticket ...it does it's job...😎😁🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for get the deal?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is saved me so many tickets is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: The detector works well and has a small footprint that ...
customer_reviews.text: The detector works well and has a small footprint that fits my mototcycle dash. The only downside is the readout would be improved if it it was brighter to offset sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This swill actually make you drive slower.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he loves it.He now drive much slower because he can find the cops Much Easier.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me multiple tickets as I moved from CA to FL. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Ashley

customer_reviews.title: not that great false alarms to much on the radar bands and ...
customer_reviews.text: not that great false alarms to much on the radar bands and with laser by the time it goes of it would be way to late
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Handy Cop Detector
customer_reviews.text: Very good system! Catches everything from the smallest speed traps to cops miles away. It also quiets down after a couple of seconds to prevent repetition of sounds. Definitely an investment worth buying which stays within a budget! Will be recommending this to more people.
customer_reviews.author: Chrismabraham

customer_reviews.title: False readings
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few weeks. Now it just beeps constantly. I will pull up at home sometimes and it will start freaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Angy

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to an adult film star as a gift. She likes going fast. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Bought this one as a present for my brother, but I have the same one. Maybe just don't leave it in your car in the hot sun... my adhesive melted
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Detector for Someone on a Budget
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive product that is reasonably efficient at picking up radar/laser signals. Manages to pick up a whole heck of a lot of interference along hte way though, and the highway/city modes don't seem to cause the device to behave differently at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Well, we didnt get pulled over so it did its job
customer_reviews.text: It went off more than it needed to but it also kept me from getting a speeding ticket, which saved me more money than it costed. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product.
customer_reviews.text: STupid cheap for such a valuable item at $60. This paid itself off the first day, no more speeding tickets.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Cobra️ ESD7570
customer_reviews.text: Cobra️ ESD7570 360 Degree Detection FOR THE MONEY IS VERY GOOD VERY HAPPY SO FAR
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Picks up allot of false readings
customer_reviews.text: Great volume control but picks up allot of false signals
customer_reviews.author: GWiz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a month now. Use it every time I drive. Seems pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Zoila

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product works like a charm. Scale 1 to 10; 1 not well and 10 great. Quality:9 Functional:10 Convience;10 Sound:7 Cons: 12v cord that looks horrible going up to the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: don't
customer_reviews.text: if you want one, spend some good money for accuracy. I was so excited to get this, I'm a bad speeder I can't help it, but it honestly just didn't work for me. I feel like it rarely ever worked accurately so after a while I just sent it back and got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: savanna manns

customer_reviews.title: Ok For The Price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Only detects some police vehicles and has somewhat poor range. They will get you before you know they’re there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: Great Detector!
customer_reviews.text: Don't really know what people are complaining about with this Detector. This thing works great! Lights up just fine. Lets me know in plenty of time when the fuzz is buzzing me for another donation. So far, since I bought this thing. I'm not contributing to the Police man's balls anymore, oh wait, Police don't have balls, lol JK
customer_reviews.author: Asa Leathers

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself with my first out of State trip!
customer_reviews.text: I read the comments, I bought it, heard it flashing around town, but when I hit the road it saved me money! I do a little racing here and there (in Mexico) and boy - oh - boy did this baby keep me out of trouble! After spotting 8+ cops on the way to and from my 1000 mile road trip, I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: cmccumbers

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of $ and works good
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Not too many false alarms. Ppl are always telling me to spend $500 on a passport but this is less than $50 and it's perfectly fine. It works. My friends passport catches signals maybe a bit earlier. But his has false alarms too and everything. No radar detector is fool proof but for a cheaper one, this ones perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Gass

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this awhile ago and I do have to say it's a very nice Radar Detector for the price and I haven't had any issues so far. It even picks up the speed cameras around schools. Cobra is really the most dependable brand for these that I've personally experienced!
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: Beeps on almost everything and just stopped
customer_reviews.text: no customer service. Past the one year warranty. Only two years old and died. Nothing can be done. There is no port for firmware update.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No speeding tickets!
customer_reviews.text: While this has saved me from possible tickets, it goes off too much from other things and annoys me, lol. I'm glad I can mute it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica F Manville

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend turning the volume down or it will drive you ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t come with an instruction manual, so we’re not sure what all the symbols and alerts it’s displays mean.. but it’s incredibly effective! Especially for the price. No need for a more expensive unit. I would recommend turning the volume down or it will drive you crazy though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality - Broke After 5 Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Part of the lights on the front panel stopped working after about 5 uses. Just went out. I can’t say whether or not it detects radar properly because I have not had a chance to fully test it out. I am highly disappointed in the cheap quality. It’s about 1 week past the 30-day return window so I can’t get a refund and will now collect dust on a shelf!
customer_reviews.author: JESSE DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: State troopers 100%
customer_reviews.text: Aslong as they have there speed radar on , this will go off and will catch it miles away ..
customer_reviews.author: HONCHO

customer_reviews.title: Good driver safety
customer_reviews.text: Great! works good wish display was brighter but it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Derick boehme

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase and I am very satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_ALG

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me within the first 24 hours of installation 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Never worked how it was supposed to. I refunded item since it was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: great detector, great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Few false alarms, and detects radar from quite a distance. Removed a star because the included suction cup mount is crap. The cups are too flat to actually hold to the windshield and won't support the bracket let alone the whole unit. I'm just using Velcro to mount it on the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

product_meta.title: Cobra️ ESD7570 - 360 Degree Detection,9 Band, Radar/Laser Detector, Fewer False Alerts, Ultrabright Display, VG-2 Immunity, Safety Alert, City/Highway Modes
product_meta.description:
The Cobra ESD 7570 is an affordable, 9-band radar/laser detector with Ultrabright data display, has an ultra-compact design with an improved range for high performance with refined style. The ESD 7570 features a digital signal strength meter to provide relative proximity to the target, city/highway selector to reduce the frequency of falsing in densely populated urban areas, LaserEye 360 degree detection, VG-2 undetectable/alert, Spectre1 undetectable/alert, Safety Alert warns driver of emergency vehicles and road hazards from system equipped with Safety Alert transmitters. This product is FCC Compliant.

AMAZON.COM


The ESD 7570 is an affordable radar/laser detector with reliable and proven performance. The unit detects all radar frequencies and laser signals currently used in United States and Canada, and comes with an UltraBright Data Display, City/Highway modes, and more.

An affordable, no-frills radar/laser detector with reliable and proven performance. Click here for a larger image UltraBright display provides easy recognition of band detected by use of band identification icons. Quick and convenient access to most used features--mute, dim, city/highway switch. NO-FRILLS RADAR DETECTION 
SPECTRE I UNDETECTABLE
Provides complete immunity to Spectre I radar detector-detectors.

VG-2 UNDETECTABLE
Provides complete immunity to VG-2 radar detector-detectors.

ULTRABRIGHT DATA DISPLAY
Provides easy recognition of band detected by use of band identification icons.

LASEREYE
Provides 360-degree detection of laser signals.

VG-2 ALERT
Alerts the user when they are under surveillance of VG-2 radar detector-detectors.

SAFETY ALERT
Warns drivers of the presence and/or approaching emergency vehicles, railroad crossing, and road hazard locations equipped with Cobra's exclusive Safety Alert transmitters.

SIGNAL STRENGTH METER
Provides the user with relative proximity to the target.

CITY/HIGHWAY MODES
Allows the user to select operating mode, reducing the frequency of falsing in densely polulated urban areas.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Cobra ESD 7570 Radar Detector, Suction-Cup Mount Windshield Bracket Kit, Coiled Power Cord, Documentation
